name: One night at bendy's 3
description:
story: after the previous events, you couldn't escape. because, again, bendy and his friends are back. and you need to protect yourself! 

well, idk. but the characters are here:

ink bendy 

bendy 

boris

ink blendy

golden bendy

golden bendybut

's';had';';dow';l B;;E;;n;;'D Y (shadow bendy)

alice

movement:

bendy, boris, and ink bendy go in the same rooms.

alice: starts in cam 2, and gets up use the light.

ink blendy:  give him more food or else...

shadow bendy: ???

golden bendy: slowly appears if your on your cams for too long. flip down the cams.

golden bendybut: sometimes after flipping down your cams, he will appear in your window. flip up the cams.

thats it???

last time I forgot to tell you in the ONAB 2 page about a an easter egg in the loading screen of ONAB 2. hint: its one of the characters in this game.

DO IT NOW
